Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $13.97
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:29:46 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Diamond burr set with 1/8″ shank and is compatible with air die grinder and most rotary tools, such as DREMEL, PROXXON, RYOBI and more.The surface is covered with a large amount of diamond grit, when sanding, polishing, carving, engraving and once attached will not easily fall off.Made of carbide steel coated with 60 grit size diamond particles.

Stone carving set with 10 different shaped grinding heads, such as sphere, cone, cylinder, round head cylinder, bullet, flat plate, etc. Different shapes can meet your various engraving and grinding needs.

Diamond bits have high working efficiency, perfect grinding effect, suitable for home improvement, carving, polishing stones, metal, jade and ceramic, DIY craft, craft modeling, a great tool for polishing, grinding, sanding, and more.

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 6.54 x 3.35 x 0.63 inches; 3.53 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ February 22, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ FOTYBEI
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0928BCXYG

【Wide Applications】Diamond grinding burr can be applied to polishing and grinding of glass and metal. It can be used for fine dressing and carving of hard materials such as hardwood, marble, granite, stone, etc.
【60 Grit Diamond】60 grit grinding head with a rougher surface and faster than large grit burrs when sanding, polishing, carving, engraving and once attached will not easily fall off. When used during high speed sanding, diamond bits will result in a smooth, polished surface.
【Different Shapes】The stone carving tool includes 10 different grinding bits, two of each form and of the same grit size. Carving bits come in various shapes including spheres, cones, cylinders, round head cylinders, bullets, and more. The different designs will meet your different requirements. Highly recommended for home improvement and craft, DIY engraving hobbies etc.
【Universal Shank】1/8″ shank diamond burr bits fit most rotary tools and die grinders, such as dremel, proxxon, ryobi, etc. And grinding head is durable and wear resistant. High compatibility and adaptability.
【Quality Assurance】20pcs diamond burr set neatly arranged in a delicate case. Please buy with confidence. If there is any problem with the product, please feel free to contact us and we will be happy to provide you a full refund or replacement. Many thanks for your support!

  1. Diamond burr set with 1/8″ shank and is compatible with air die grinder and most rotary tools, such as DREMEL, PROXXON, RYOBI and more.
  2. The surface is covered with a large amount of diamond grit, when sanding, polishing, carving, engraving and once attached will not easily fall off.
  3. Made of carbide steel coated with 60 grit size diamond particles.

Stone carving set with 10 different shaped grinding heads, such as sphere, cone, cylinder, round head cylinder, bullet, flat plate, etc. Different shapes can meet your various engraving and grinding needs.

Diamond bits have high working efficiency, perfect grinding effect, suitable for home improvement, carving, polishing stones, metal, jade and ceramic, DIY craft, craft modeling, a great tool for polishing, grinding, sanding, and more.

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:29:46 UTC – Details)

Product description CMWDG Wood Carving Drill Bits 20Pcs Set Unlike Any Other:The solid tungsten carbide burr set gives you a massive selection of shapes for all types of cuts, It will leave a smoother finish than single cut burrs due to producing smaller chips as they cut away the material. Used for medium-light stock removal, deburring, finishing, and cleaning. ★Carbide Burr Material:wood carving bits are made from highly durable tungsten carbide tungsten steel that will stand up to time. Package: 20pc etching tool in a storage box. Order this rotary grinder burr bit set and you’ll receive a great storage box for easy shipping and safekeeping. Box Size: 2.51”x1.73”x0.78” ★ Multi-Purpose Drill bit set for metal precision metalworking, engineering, toolmaking, welding, deburring, jewelry making, or if you enjoy various DIY arts and crafts or hobbies such as wood carving. ★ After Sales Service If you have any questions about our micro drill bit set, please feel free to contact us, we will make sure to resolve all your concerns within 24 business hours.
【Wood Carving Bits】Ideal for precision metalworking, engineering, tool making, welding, deburring, jewelry making, and hobbies such as various DIY arts and crafts or wood carving;wood carving bits are made of highly durable tungsten carbide tungsten steel that will stand the test of time .
【Rotary Tool Accessories Kit】The 20-Piece Wood Drill Bit Kit includes everything you need to cut, shape, grind, polish and remove sharp edges. And is compatible with ferrous and non-ferrous metals, wood, plastic and even stone. The kit includes suitable for all types of cuts such as impellers, cylinders, cylinders, cones and needles.
【Professional Tools】Unlike similar products on the market, these engraved burrs reduce cutting time. Suitable for castings, implant tools, forging and finishing trimming, veining and weld cleaning in a variety of metallic and non-metallic dies.
【Cutting Tool Adaptability】Most die grinders and small rotary tools with three-jaw chucks for precise centering. Wide variety for fine detail work including cutting, engraving, grinding, polishing, trimming, deburring, chamfering, grooving, reaming, hollowing, bevelling, repairing, and Finishing.
【Easy Storage Gift Set】20pc etching tool in a storage box. Order this Rotary Grinder Burr Bit Set and you’ll receive a great storage box for easy shipping and safekeeping.No more misplacing or losing your bits, they’re always available every time you need them.

4.5

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:27:47 UTC – Details)

▲Package Included:
1 x (1/4 * 1/4 * 65mm length — 1/4 ” shank can be converted to 6.35mm square head)Socket Adapter
1 x (3/8 * 1/4 * 65mm length — 1/4 ” shank can be converted to 9mm square head)Socket Adapter
1 x (1/2 * 1/4 * 72mm length — 1/4 ” shank can be converted to 13mm square head)Socket Adapter
1 x 105 Degree Right Angle Drill
▲Key Features: 
1. Adapts sockets to power drills and drivers
2. Detent ball for secure socket retention so sockets snap on tightly and won’t slip off
3. 1/4-inch hex shank prevents stripping during high speed drill operation
4. Super strong heat-treated chrome vanadium steel for normal and impact use
5. Sandblasted finish
6. Converts all power drills into speedy socket drivers
7. Use with a hand screwdriver handle or battery/power tool
8. Color coded for easy recognition 
▲Specification:
● Material: stainless steel
● Color: silver(as pictures shown)
● Size: approx. 5.9 x 3cm
● Model: 1/4″ (6.35mm)
● Fits: 1/4″ 6.35mm hex drill bit screwdriver
Features:
● 105°designs for tight spaces, extends the power of a cordless screwdriver, max torque: 10n/m.
● 1/4 inch hex drive shaft is quick change compatible and fits most power drill and driver chucks.
● 105 Degree Right Angle Driver Drilling and Driving Power Screwdriver Drill Attachment with 1/4-inch Hex Quick Change Drive and Magnetic Bit Socket
● Easy & fast, connect to the standard hex screwdrier.
● Can be connected to drill, rechargeable drill or manual wrench.
● Easy, Lightweight, fast, connect to the standard hex screwdrier.
● The gears are mounted in a die cast with 3 durable ball bearings.
● Magnetic 1/4 inch hex socket accepts and holds standard drill and driver bits.
● Perfect handy tool for hard-to-reach areas.Connect hand drill and manual wrench.
【Colorful】：Easy to Choose: Different colour coded rings, clear help quickly pick the right one. Our products belong to the latest upgrades, quality is super good.Christmas Gift for Dad/Father,Husband, Boyfriend, Men,DIY.
CR-V and black phosphate finish. Forged with heat treated chrome vanadium steel for superior strength, each adapter with corrosion-resistant black phosphate finish for against rust and corrosion. Detent ball on adapters provides a secure fit into the socket,reduces wear and prevents rounding off at corners,ensuring does not wobble while working.
【Multifunction-3Pcs】Used in the installation of pneumatic screwdriver, electric screwdriver, pneumatic drill, manual screwdriver and other installation for the hexagonal tool .It is a good accessory for conversion. for Universal Socket,Impact Adapter and Reducer Set,Universal Joint Set,Socket Adapter and Drive Reducer Set,Drive Impact Socket Extension Bar Set,Drive Impact Socket Set.
【Purpose-3Pcs】: This adapter set is designed to provide a securely locked in extension to your existing tool. Provides additional length to reach into a multitude of hard to reach spaces. The spring ball lock ensures a tight fit into the driver head to prevent slipping during use. Specifically machined to fit securely into a hand held driver, drill driver or impact wrench.
【Wide application-105°Right Angle Drill Driver】Can be connected to the drill, rechargeable drill or manual wrench, extending their reach to inaccessible stenosis , twisting screws, nut and more【Features】105° designs for tight spaces, extends the power of a cordless screwdriver – 100 in/lbs. torque, 400 RPM.These Tools are Work Great for Light Drilling,Slow Speed/Screw Driving,Like Cordless Drill,Ratchet Hand Screwdriver,etc.

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $19.99 - $15.99
(as of Nov 28,2022 23:19:30 UTC – Details)

Product Description

20PCS Tungsten Carbide Burr Set, Shank Dia.: 1/8″(3mm), Designed in Germany, Manufactured by Germany and USA-made 6-Axis CNC in China, Packaging: 1 Plastic Box and 1 Paper box.

10 x Head Dia.: 3mm Solid Carbide, Overall L 38mm, 9 Flutes.

10 x Head Dia.: 6mm Brazed Joint, Shank Material 40Cr, Overall L 43 to 50mm, 14 Flutes.

Head Hardness: HRA90, Cut Type: Double Cut, Coating: Bright (Uncoated).

Max Rotation Speed: 120000 RPM(Head Dia. 3mm), 60000 RPM(Head Dia. 6mm), Direction of Rotation: Right Hand/Clockwise, Feed Direction: In general, burrs are used counter-rotationally or with a swinging motion. Pass the tool rapidly over the workpiece in the direction of rotation to achieve ﬁne ﬁnishes or to achieve very smooth chamfers.

Burr Shape: End Cut Cylindrical, Ball Nosed Cylindrical, Ball, Oval, Ball Nosed Tree, Tree, Flame, Ball Nosed Cone, Cone, Inverted Cone.

Optimal Drive Tool: Straight, Angle Die Grinder, Flexible Shaft Drive, Robot. Average Drive Tool: Drill, Drill Press. Drive Type: Air or Electric.

Optimal Fix Type: 1/8 inch collect, Average Fix Type: Chuck.

Materials Applications: Hard Wood, Balsa, Wax, Soapstone, Slate, Marble, Granite, Concrete, Steel, Hardened Steel, Weld-Seam, Stainless Steel, Brass, Copper, Bronze, Aluminum, Cast Iron, Cobalt, Nickel, Titanium, Zinc, Earthenware, Terracotta, Porcelain, Fiberglass, Plastic, Rubber, Fiber-Reinforced Plastics and so on.

Burr Applications: Carving, Engraving, Sculpturing, Polishing, Deburring, Contouring, Chamfering, Milling, Cleaning, Porting, Cutting, Grinding, Elongating Holes etc.

Recommendation: 1. Grinding welds, hardened steel, a tool drive output of 300-500 watts is optimal. 2. For beginners pls choose more smaller burr head dia. than the holes’ dia. and swing-move the burr to elongate holes, otherwise the burrs will chatter in narrow holes caused by not grab tool firm and stably. 3. Do not press hard the tool, let speed do the work.

Burrs Qty.
10PC 20PC 8PC 10PC

Head Dia.
6mm 3 and 6mm 6,10 and 12mm 6,8 and 10mm

Shank Dia.
1/8″ 1/8″ 1/4″ 1/4″

Double Cut: Produces a finer finish than single cut and reduces the size of the chips and slivers. It also gives greater tool control.
A Must-Have: The 20-PC carbide burrs kit is a great assortment. The differing profiles let wood carvers or metal engravers trim any shape with ease.
Great Addition to Rotary tools: Compatible with APEXFORGE, Beyond, Bosch, DeWALT, Dremel, FIXTEC, Foredom, Goplus, GOXAWEE, Hammerhead, Ingersoll-Rand, Makita, MAXMAN, Milwaukee, PFERD, Populo, Proxxon, RYOBI, TECCPO, Vastar, WEN, WORKPRO, WORX.
Sharp, Durable and Well Balanced: The carbide burr set cut through extraneous material like a hot knife through butter. No wear out after a long time use. The shaft will not bend at high speed.
Great for detail work, Not great for hogging out material. For that, we’d recommend some larger ones.

20PCS Tungsten Carbide Burr Set, Shank Dia.: 1/8″(3mm), Designed in Germany, Manufactured by Germany and USA-made 6-Axis CNC in China, Packaging: 1 Plastic Box and 1 Paper box.

10 x Head Dia.: 3mm Solid Carbide, Overall L 38mm, 9 Flutes.

10 x Head Dia.: 6mm Brazed Joint, Shank Material 40Cr, Overall L 43 to 50mm, 14 Flutes.

Head Hardness: HRA90, Cut Type: Double Cut, Coating: Bright (Uncoated).

Max Rotation Speed: 120000 RPM(Head Dia. 3mm), 60000 RPM(Head Dia. 6mm), Direction of Rotation: Right Hand/Clockwise, Feed Direction: In general, burrs are used counter-rotationally or with a swinging motion. Pass the tool rapidly over the workpiece in the direction of rotation to achieve ﬁne ﬁnishes or to achieve very smooth chamfers.

Burr Shape: End Cut Cylindrical, Ball Nosed Cylindrical, Ball, Oval, Ball Nosed Tree, Tree, Flame, Ball Nosed Cone, Cone, Inverted Cone.

Optimal Drive Tool: Straight, Angle Die Grinder, Flexible Shaft Drive, Robot. Average Drive Tool: Drill, Drill Press. Drive Type: Air or Electric.

Optimal Fix Type: 1/8 inch collect, Average Fix Type: Chuck.

Materials Applications: Hard Wood, Balsa, Wax, Soapstone, Slate, Marble, Granite, Concrete, Steel, Hardened Steel, Weld-Seam, Stainless Steel, Brass, Copper, Bronze, Aluminum, Cast Iron, Cobalt, Nickel, Titanium, Zinc, Earthenware, Terracotta, Porcelain, Fiberglass, Plastic, Rubber, Fiber-Reinforced Plastics and so on.

Burr Applications: Carving, Engraving, Sculpturing, Polishing, Deburring, Contouring, Chamfering, Milling, Cleaning, Porting, Cutting, Grinding, Elongating Holes etc.

Recommendation: 1. Grinding welds, hardened steel, a tool drive output of 300-500 watts is optimal. 2. For beginners pls choose more smaller burr head dia. than the holes’ dia. and swing-move the burr to elongate holes, otherwise the burrs will chatter in narrow holes caused by not grab tool firm and stably. 3. Do not press hard the tool, let speed do the work.
